Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package nghttp2 for versions less than 1.61.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package nghttp2 for versions less than 1.61.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nghttp2 is earlier than 1.61.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-28182
